cave.mouth: A deep hole which seems to swallow all light. Animals seem to quiet around this hole.
cave.level-1: An inky blackness. A low roar.
cave.level-2: The darkness seems to be lifting. You hear a trickle far below.
cave.level-3: A grotto illuminated by a cool glow.

meadow.rim: You stand at the rim of a broad, shining meadow.

lonely-mountain.base: The mountain rises high above you...
lonely-mountain.peak: All the Earth rolls out before you. Only the eagles have seen this sight.

Kalm.outskirts: In the distance, you see a small town with purple roofs, beset with snow.
Kalm.square:
You enter the square of the town of Kalm. The spire of a Gothic church looms over the square.
Hanging from its point, an auburn banner flaps in the breeze.

church.entrance: Cloudlight filters through the stained glass. It's dim, save for a few candles burning at altars around the room.

altar.info: A yellowed cloth covers a simple altar. A candle stands at each end. There is a small dish for alms.
altar.alms-y: You drop a coin into the dish.

douglass.worship-prompt: Have you come to worship with us? (y/n)
douglass.worship-y: Wonderful. Please join me at the altar.
douglass.seek-prompt: Then, what is it that you seek? (food/shelter/directions/nothing)
douglass.food-worship-y-alms-y: I'm sorry. We have not the funds to feed those who may feed themselves.
douglass.food-worship-y-alms-n: You have little by way of earthly goods. Come back tonight for a small meal.
douglass.shelter-worship-y-alms-y: If you have given what little you had, you may retrieve it for lodging.
douglass.shelter-worship-y-alms-n: I can offer you a pew.
douglass.directions: I know little outside of my parish.
douglass.nothing-worship-n: May you return to us with an open heart.
